siri:SummaryContent.siri:SummaryText: Interrupted train service between Kaufdorf and Bern.

siri:ReasonContent.siri:ReasonText: This is due to a strike.

siri:ConsequenceContent.siri:ConsequenceText: You have to expect cancellations, changed timetables and different connections. Line S2 does not stop in Gümligen. Bikes cannot be transported.

siri:RecommendationContent.siri:RecommendationText: Registration recommended for customers in a wheelchair. We recommend you to check your timetable online shortly before travelling.

siri:SummaryContent.siri:SummaryText: Limited train service between Bern and Zollikofen are subject to restrictions.

siri:ReasonContent.siri:ReasonText: This is due to construction work.

siri:ConsequenceContent.siri:ConsequenceText: You have to expect cancellations, changed timetables and different connections.

siri:RecommendationContent.siri:RecommendationText: We recommend you to check your timetable online shortly before travelling.

siri:DurationContent.siri:DurationText: The restriction lasts from 27.10.2024 to 28.10.2024, respectively from 00:40 - 05:25. The restriction lasts from 03.11.2024 to 04.11.2024, respectively from 00:40 - 05:25. The restriction lasts from 10.11.2024 to 11.11.2024, respectively from 00:40 - 05:25. The restriction lasts from 17.11.2024 to 18.11.2024, respectively from 00:40 - 05:25. The restriction lasts from 01.12.2024 to 02.12.2024, respectively from 00:40 - 05:25.

siri:SummaryContent.siri:SummaryText: Limited train service between Thun and Bern are subject to restrictions.

siri:ReasonContent.siri:ReasonText: This is due to construction work.

siri:DescriptionContent.siri:DescriptionText: Limited train service between Thun and Bern are subject to restrictions. This is due to construction work. The restriction lasts from 27.11.2024, 20:27 until 29.11.2024, 08:27. You have to expect cancellations, changed timetables and different connections. Bikes cannot be transported. Passengers travelling between Thun and Bern please use the replacement bus service (EV). Registration recommended for customers in a wheelchair. We recommend you to check your timetable online shortly before travelling. The online timetable will be updated. Purchasing international tickets or saver tickets and making reservations is currently not possible.

siri:ConsequenceContent.siri:ConsequenceText: You have to expect cancellations, changed timetables and different connections. Bikes cannot be transported.

siri:RecommendationContent.siri:RecommendationText: Passengers travelling between Thun and Bern please use the replacement bus service (EV). Registration recommended for customers in a wheelchair. We recommend you to check your timetable online shortly before travelling.
